snippet: None of the 15 people at a Canadian Valley Technology Center were hurt after a tornado, but had it been a busy day the result may have been tragic.
abstract: None of the 15 people at tornado-wrecked campus of Canadian Valley Technology Center in El Reno, Okla, were hurt, but had it been a busy day at vocational school the result may have been tragic; incident provides another lesson for state and local officials about the value of underground shelters or safe rooms at Oklahoma schools.
lead_paragraph: None of the 15 people at a Canadian Valley Technology Center were hurt after a tornado, but had it been a busy day the result may have been tragic.

headline.seo: Oklahoma Campus Draws Attention to Storm Shelters
headline.main: Oklahoma Campus, Ravaged by a Tornado, Draws Attention to Storm Shelters
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Campus, Ravaged by a Tornado, Draws Attention to Storm Shelters
